process.enrollDescription: Select the plan that fits your needs and start your journey to an iconic brand.
process.shareDescription: Share your vision with us, and we’ll bring it to life with stunning designs.
process.receiveDescription: Your Iconic Brand is Ready! Receive your final designs with revisions until 100% satisfied.

benefits.description: Our plans come with the promise of limitless creativity and dedicated support.
benefits.expertDesignersDescription: With years of experience and a portfolio of successful projects, we deliver designs you can trust.
benefits.uniqueDesignsDescription: Stand out with custom, one-of-a-kind designs tailored specifically for your brand.
benefits.engagingVisualsDescription: Our visuals are designed to captivate your audience and leave a lasting impression.
benefits.fastDeliveryDescription: Get your designs quickly, professionally, and efficiently, ensuring your projects stay on track.
benefits.transparentPricingDescription: We offer clear and competitive pricing with no hidden fees. Choose a plan that fits your budget.
benefits.fullSatisfactionDescription: Your satisfaction is our top priority. We promise to do our best to make you 100% satisfied.

services.description: From logo design to brand identity, our expert team crafts unique visual solutions that elevate your business and leave a lasting impact.
services.logoDesignDescription: Creative logo designs that reflect your company’s vision and leave a lasting impression. Our designers work closely with you to deliver a logo that stands out.
services.brandIdentityDesignDescription: Comprehensive designs including business cards, letterheads, envelopes, and more to elevate your brand identity. We help you create a consistent and recognizable brand image across all platforms.
services.logoAnimationDescription: Short videos that bring your logo to life and captivate your audience. We create dynamic and engaging logo animations that leave a lasting impression.
services.socialMediaDesignsDescription: Elevate your social media presence with custom designs tailored to your brand. We create eye-catching visuals that boost engagement and attract followers.
services.graphicsDesignDescription: Enhance your brand's visual communication with custom graphics. From marketing materials to social media content, our designers bring your ideas to life.
services.websiteDesignAndDevelopmentDescription: Professional and user-friendly websites that showcase your identity and meet your clients' needs. Our design team ensures your online presence is both visually appealing and highly functional.
services.managingAdsCampaignsDescription: Launch successful advertising campaigns that capture attention and drive results. From concept to execution, we ensure your message reaches the right audience.
services.socialMediaManagementDescription: Innovative management for your social media pages and ad campaigns to increase engagement and expand your brand’s reach. We create, schedule, and optimize content to grow your audience and enhance your brand’s online visibility.

testimonials.description: See how our designs and fast delivery helped businesses stand out. Clients share how we turned their ideas into unforgettable brand identities.

pricing.title: Pricing That Fits
pricing.description: Explore our flexible pricing for comprehensive design services that make your brand stand out—transparent, with no hidden fees.

features.eight: Logo Animation: A short video to bring your logo to life

otherPackages.one: Simple yet professional logo animation with smooth transitions and minimal effects. Delivered in MP4 and GIF formats to suit your needs.
otherPackages.two: Complex, professional logo animation with dynamic transitions and effects. Delivered in MP4 and GIF formats for versatile presentation.
otherPackages.three: 20 high-quality social media designs tailored to your brand's needs, ensuring visually appealing and engaging content across all platforms.
otherPackages.four: Custom graphics to enhance your brand’s visual communication. Includes brochures, flyers, social media designs, and tailored materials.
otherPackages.five: Professional, user-friendly websites with modern UI/UX design, customized functionality, and optimized user experience for enhanced engagement.
otherPackages.six: Monthly management of social platforms with creative content creation, efficient scheduling, and thorough performance analysis to enhance audience engagement.
otherPackages.seven: Monthly advertising campaign management, featuring campaign setup, optimization, budget management, and detailed performance tracking.

takeAction.description: Looking for a custom logo and brand identity that reflects your vision? You’re in the right place—let’s create a lasting impression!

faq.title: FAQs
faq.description: Find the information you need about our services, plans, and processes. If you have more questions, feel free to reach out to us!

q.one: How does the logo design process work?
q.six: How will communication work during the project?
q.eight: What is your cancellation and refund policy?
q.nine: Is my data safe with you?
q.ten: How can I file a complaint?
q.eleven: What happens if we can’t reach an agreement?

a.one: We start by understanding your vision and brand goals, then present several design concepts. After you choose your preferred concept, we refine it until we achieve the final design.
a.two: Yes, all designs are 100% original and custom-made for your brand. No templates or copies are used.
a.three: Each package includes a specific number of free revisions
a.four: The cost depends on your chosen package. We require a 50% upfront payment to start the project, and the remaining 50% is due upon final delivery. Our pricing is transparent with no hidden fees. You can pay via cash, bank transfer, or electronic payment platforms.
a.five: Delivery time depends on the package you choose, ranging from 5 to 14 business days. If you need faster delivery, we offer an Express package. In case of any delays, we will inform you as soon as possible.
a.six: You can communicate via WhatsApp, email, or phone calls. You will have a dedicated project manager to update you and address your concerns.
a.seven: Once the full payment is made, the design becomes your complete property, and you can use it as you wish. We retain the right to display the design in our portfolio unless you request otherwise.
a.eight: You can cancel the order after work has begun, but a 50% deduction will be applied to cover operational costs. After the final delivery, no refunds can be issued.
a.nine: Absolutely! We are committed to protecting your data and will not share it with any third parties. Your information is used solely to complete the agreed-upon work.
a.ten: You can submit your complaint via email or phone. We respond to all complaints within 48 business hours
a.eleven: We will attempt to resolve the dispute amicably. If no agreement is reached, we will resort to arbitration under the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services.

section1.minorRevisionsDescription: Include color changes, font adjustments, or moving simple elements.
section1.majorRevisionsDescription: Include complete redesigns, restructuring main elements, changing the logo, or adding entirely new elements.
section1.minorRevisionFee: $30 for each additional minor revision after exhausting the agreed number of revisions.
section1.majorRevisionFee: $50 to $150 for each major revision, depending on the scale and complexity of the changes.

section2.advancePaymentDescription1: 50% of the total amount is required as an advance before work begins.
section2.advancePaymentDescription2: The remaining 50% is due upon delivery of the final work.
section2.paymentMethodsDescription: Cash, bank transfer, or electronic payment platforms.

section3.noteDescription: Delivery timelines may be extended in case of additional revision requests or unforeseen circumstances. The client will be informed of any potential delays as soon as possible.
section3.fileDeliveryDescription: Final files will be delivered via email or file-sharing platforms. Files include: (PDF, PNG, JPEG) for designs, and (MP4, GIF) for animations.

section4.beforeWorkBeginsDescription: If the client cancels the order before work begins, 100% of the advance payment will be refunded.
section4.afterWorkBeginsDescription: If the client cancels the order after work begins, 50% of the total amount will be deducted. This covers part of the operational costs and time already invested.
section4.afterDeliveryDescription: No refunds will be issued after the final work has been delivered.

section5.clientRightsDescription: After full payment, the client has the right to use the designs as they see fit. We reserve the right to display the designs in our portfolio unless the client requests otherwise.
section5.sevenDesignStudioRightsDescription: We retain intellectual property rights to the designs until full payment is received.

section6.dataProtectionDescription: We are committed to protecting client data and will not share it with any third parties. Client data will only be used to execute the agreed-upon work.

section7.filingComplaintDescription: Clients can file complaints via email or phone. Complaints will be addressed within 48 working hours.
section7.disputeResolutionDescription: Any disputes will be resolved amicably. If no resolution is reached, arbitration will be sought by the laws of [Country].

section8.rightToAmendDescription: We reserve the right to amend this policy at any time. Clients will be informed of any changes via the website or email.

section9.agreementDescription: By proceeding with the work, the client agrees to all the terms and conditions outlined above.

meeting.apologyMessage: We apologize in advance, but booking a meeting doesn’t guarantee acceptance. We work exclusively with clients we’re confident can achieve outstanding results through our expertise.
